menu.AddProfile.Hover: Add^Add a new profile to the end of the list.
menu.Conditions.Hover: Enter a Game State Query here to specify when this profile should apply (empty always applies). Lower-numbered profiles are checked first.
menu.QuickConditionsSpring.Hover: Spring^Apply in Spring. Query: LOCATION_SEASON Here Spring
menu.QuickConditionsSummer.Hover: Summer^Apply in Summer. Query: LOCATION_SEASON Here Summer
menu.QuickConditionsFall.Hover: Fall^Apply in Fall. Query: LOCATION_SEASON Here Fall
menu.QuickConditionsWinter.Hover: Winter^Apply in Winter. Query: LOCATION_SEASON Here Winter
menu.QuickConditionsIndoors.Hover: Indoors^Apply when indoors. Query: LOCATION_IS_INDOORS Here
menu.ColorizeWorld.Hover: Apply this color profile to the world layer.
menu.ColorizeUI.Hover: Apply this color profile to the UI layer (menus, HUD).
menu.ColorizeTitleScreen.Hover: Apply this color profile to the title screen.
menu.ColorBalance.Hover: Color Balance^In each color group (cyan-red, magenta-green, and yellow-blue), the three sliders control shadows, midtones, and highlights, respectively.
menu.RevertButton.Hover: Revert^Reset all color sliders to the state they were in when you loaded this profile.
menu.ClearButton.Hover: Clear^Reset all color sliders to zero.
menu.CopyButton.Hover: Copy^Copy the state of the color sliders.
menu.PasteButton.Hover: Paste^Paste the state of the color sliders.
menu.PreviewButton.Hover: Preview^When held, applies the initial state of the sliders instead of the current state. Does not affect checkboxes.
menu.EnableDepthOfField.Hover: Blur the top and bottom of the screen to simulate parts of the image being out of focus.
menu.Field.Hover: How deep the field is: i.e. how much of the screen is fully in focus (no blur).
menu.Intensity.Hover: How powerful the blur effect is (at maximum).

gmcm.OpenMenu.tooltip: Nightshade's own menu provides live preview of profile and slider settings.
